related_post.text: Helloo guys I have a problem to format time.Duration. I want to display Hours but I got error : cannot use value of type float64 as string value in assignment. Is there any method to display hours from a time.Duration ? please Here is my code : ```go if p.Contract.WeeklyDuration != nil { args["shifts"] = p.Contract.WeeklyDuration.Hours() } else { args["shifts"] = p.FormatShifts(loc) }```

comments: Kayo has question and Masud provides SO post answer
